de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics

Interface GameCamera

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resizeable, Updateable

    public interface GameCamera
extends Updateable, Resizeable
    Tracks a camera and make it following a target
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GameCamera.ZoomMode
      The zoom mode of the camera.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void focusCentered()
      Focuses directly on the target
      void focusCentered(GameObject object)
      When no target is defined or the given object is the target, it focuses the game camera onto the given object.

      Provides the current base zoom
      float getDistanceTo(float targetX, float targetY)
      Gets the distance between the center of this camera and the target position.

      Gets the distance between the center of this camera and the center of the given game object.

    • Method Detail

      • setDistanceStoppingThreshold

        void setDistanceStoppingThreshold(float distanceThreshold)
        Sets a new threshold to where the camera should stop tracking. The distance also takes camera zoom into account. Defaults to 0.
        Parameters:
        distanceThreshold -

      • setTargetTrackingSpeed

        void setTargetTrackingSpeed(float speed)
        Sets a new speed value
        Parameters:
        speed -

      • setTargetTrackingSpeed

        void setTargetTrackingSpeed(float speedX,
                          float speedY)
        Sets a new speed value

      • setZoomScalingFactor

        void setZoomScalingFactor(float zoomScale)
        Sets a new zoom scale factor
        Parameters:
        zoomScale -

      • setStickToWorldBounds

        void setStickToWorldBounds(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the camera to stick to the current GameWorld bounds. By default this is enabled.

      • getDefaultZoomFactor

        float getDefaultZoomFactor()
        Provides the current base zoom
        Returns:
        baseZoom

      • setDefaultZoomFactor

        void setDefaultZoomFactor(float zoom)
        Sets the base zoom
        Parameters:
        zoom - baseZoom

      • zoom

        void zoom(float amount)
        Zooms the current baseZoom.
        Parameters:
        amount - the base zoom amount

      • setZoom

        void setZoom(float value,
           GameCamera.ZoomMode zoomMode)
        Sets a new zoom value, based on the mode.
        Parameters:
        value -
        zoomMode -

      • setZoom

        void setZoom(float value)
        Sets a new zoom value. Defaults to TO_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        value -

      • focusCentered

        void focusCentered()
        Focuses directly on the target

      • focusCentered

        void focusCentered(GameObject object)
        When no target is defined or the given object is the target, it focuses the game camera onto the given object.

      • setTrackingTarget

        void setTrackingTarget(GameObject target)
        Sets a new target. Focuses by default.
        Parameters:
        target - the target

      • setTrackingTarget

        void setTrackingTarget(GameObject target,
                     boolean focus)
        Sets a new target and determines if focusCentered or not.
        Parameters:
        target - the target
        focus - focusCentered target on attach

        float getDistanceTo(float targetX,

        Gets the distance between the center of this camera and the target position.
        Parameters:
        targetX - target x
        targetY - target y
        Returns:
        the distance
